tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    quantity_ordered INT,
    order_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Inventory (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  vendor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES Vendors(id)
);

CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
  order_item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  order_id INT NOT NULL,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  unit_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES CustomerOrders(order_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Inventory(id)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
item_name TEXT NOT NULL,
quantity INT NOT NULL,
price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE vendors (vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
vendor_name TEXT NOT NULL,
contact_number TEXT,
address TEXT);

CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
customer_name TEXT NOT NULL,
order_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
status TEXT);

CREATE TABLE order_items (order_item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
order_id INT,
item_id INT,
quantity INT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE order_history (order_history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
order_id INT,
status TEXT,
timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
